name: OpenWeatherMap
description: Retrieves current weather and forecasts from OpenWeatherMap
introductoryText:
![OpenWeatherMap](data:image/png;base64,)


Connector to retrieve current weather and forecasts from [OpenWeatherMap](https://openweathermap.org/).


Each input record must consist either of:

(1) A latitude and a longitude field.

(2) A city field and optionally a state and country field. Country fields must be specified according to the [ISO 3166 specification](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/List_of_ISO_3166_country_codes). If no country code is given, the country is assumed to be the United States of America.

(3) A postcode and optionally a country field. The same rules as in (2) apply for the country code.


The block requires an API key. The keys can be requested [here](https://openweathermap.org/appid). Free accounts are subject to a rate limit of 60 calls per minute. If you have a paid subscription, untick the checkbox "Apply free account rate limit". In all other cases leave the option, otherwise the account will be suspended.

options.name: applyRateLimit
options.title: Apply free account rate limit
options.description: Tick this if you have a free account. Only 60 API calls per minute are allowed.

choices.title: By city, state and country code
